messages.message: <!here> have we made any recent changes to file picker? We are observing a bizarre issue at First Republic where when all the services are restarted, Instabase works without any hiccups until we open the file picker modal. The moment we open file picker, everything slows down.
Not anything that hasn't been in production for a while... is it happening on any instances of Instabase I have access to?
And where is the file picker being opened? File system or in an app?
You don't have access to this instance of Instabase. It is happening in First Republic network. I can setup a Webex if you are around.
Happens when file picker is used in file system.
again, this is all very preliminary
Now, we just found a case when it started happening outside file picker as well while browsing general file system.
Perhaps, the problem is more generic.
I wonder if it's some specific files in their file system that aren't playing nicely?
It can very well be a problem with their infrastructure.

For instance, there's a bug in the filesystem I haven't fixed yet (because it'll be very involved to fix and this is unlikely to happen) where if you have a folder and file named the exact same thing (so no extension on the file) both nodes will be broken. It could be something like that.
I dont think thats whats happening here
